homepage.title: Developer Hub
homepage.description: One place for all Metaplex developer resources.

categoryDescriptions.tokens: Create, read, update, burn, and transfer tokens on the Solana blockchain using Metaplex SDKs.
categoryDescriptions.nfts: Create, read, update, burn, and transfer NFTs on the Solana blockchain using Metaplex SDKs.
categoryDescriptions.smartContracts: On-chain programs for creating and managing digital assets on Solana.
categoryDescriptions.devTools: Tools and utilities to help you build with Metaplex programs.

meta.defaultDescription: The complete guide to building on Metaplex.
meta.candyMachineDescription: The easiest way to create and manage NFT drops on Solana.
meta.umiDescription: A Solana framework for JavaScript clients.
meta.guidesDescription: Step-by-step tutorials to help you build on Metaplex.
